name: 2D shooter - Galaxy Wars
description:
Coursera Assignment - 2D Shooter game

My added modifications:

- Instructions panel in the Main Menu

- One extra level ( 3 in total)

- Extra file game object. Its purpose is when you collect it, you gain an extra life. Also attached to it a sound effect

- Enemy spawner in Level 2

- A text display in the right top corner of your current holding lifes

- A text display in the top center, that indicates how many remaining enemies you need to destroy to complete the level

Credits: Greta Masiulyte
